'''Nicole Evangeline Lilly''' (born [[3 August]], [[1979]] in Fort Saskatchewan, Alberta) is a Canadian actress. She portrayed [[Tauriel]] in the [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit film series'']].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Peter Jackson]]|articleurl=http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=10150286515141558|articlename=The Hobbit Casting Update|dated=19-June-2011|website=[http://www.facebook.com/ Facebook]|accessed=22-Dec-2011}}</ref>  She was raised in British Columbia by her mother and father and is the middle of three sisters.

==Trivia==
She is fluent in French<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1431940/trivia/|articlename=Evangeline Lilly: Trivia|author=IMDB|accessed=19 October 2024}}</ref>

Prior to ''Lost'', her only acting credits had been commercials and un-credited parts as an extra.<ref name=":0" />

From 2004 to 2009 she was in relationship with [[Dominic Monaghan]], her co-star from the series ''[[Wikipedia:Lost (TV series)|Lost]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Charmaine Patterson|articleurl=https://people.com/tv/dominic-monaghan-opens-up-about-evangeline-lilly-split/|articlename=Dominic Monaghan Says He 'Only Got My Heart Broken Once' as He Opens Up About Evangeline Lilly Split|dated=31 August 2022|website=People|accessed=1 January 2023}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=Giada Iuliano|articleurl=https://www.elle.com/it/showbiz/news/a864173/e-finita-tra-evangeline-lilly-e-dominic-monaghan/|articlename=Showbiz Ãˆ finita tra Evangeline Lilly e Dominic Monaghan?|dated=28 October 2009|website=elle|accessed=1 January 2023}}</ref>

Returned to work three months after giving birth to begin filming ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''<ref name=":0" />

==Quotes==
{{quote|I was a die-hard fan of these books before the films ever came out. And when I say die-hard, I wasn't the person who could speak Elvish, but I really loved them. And I wasn't actually going to see the original films, because I didn't think it was possible that a film could represent the books appropriately...And then my family all took a jaunt together...to see the movies, and were like, "What, you're just going to stay home?" 

So I saw the movies and was thoroughly impressed that Peter Jackson managed to make my vision of the book come to life, as well as my sister's and my father's, and my aunt's and my uncle's, everyone's. It seemed to somehow pan across everyone's vision, even though we all knew we had to have had different visions of the books.|Evangeline Lilly, Collider}}
==Awards==
*[[2013]] - '''[http://www.mtv.com/ MTV Movie Award]''', Best Fight, ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
